name: protein
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Increases Attack effort by 10, but won’t increase it beyond 100. Increases happiness by 5/3/2.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Attack stat of a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.platinum: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Attack stat of a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Attack stat of a single Pokémon.
